Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Dark One/Shockwave:


Nemesis Enforcer blocks with his wings, but is sent flying back, slamming to 
the ground,  firing 10 rapid optic blasts at Jetstorm's abdomen.

---

Scattershot yelled as the missiles came, twirling through the air letting 
them pass, keeping a cool composure on the outside, the inside he was getting 
beat.  The shockwave of the missiles had almost made him lose his balance in 
the air and crash.

But he was able to stay up.  Reaching into subspace, he pulled out two 
grenades, one for each hand.  He dropped both grenades down at Sharpedge, 
both explosives set to go off on impact.

---

Dark One got a target lock on Diskus, but saw that Nemesis Enforcer was 
nearly beaten in his current situation.  Jetstorm (Dark One doesn't know who 
he is though) looked like a formidable opponent though.  Changing his course, 
he fired twenty-five rapid laser blasts off at Jestorm's back.

The black jet fighter continued with on course, his missile launchers arming.

------

Shockwave stepped out of the forest, looking at the battle and carnage.  Even 
if he could've smiled, he wouldn't have.  His white right hand transformed 
into a long barrel.  The 'Decepticon' looked around for a target, Alliance or 
otherwise.
